articles.title: Graham Potter addresses Yves Bissouma transfer links with Liverpool and Man Utd - Mirror Online
articles.description: Real Madrid and Arsenal are also among the clubs believed to be tracking Bissouma following his impressive start to the season on the south coast
articles.content:
Brighton manager Graham Potter insists the club have had "no approaches" for midfielder Yves Bissouma despite reported interest from Liverpool and Man Utd.

articles.author: Eve Watson
articles.title: Video shows St Blazey party in Plymouth being shut down by Les Dennis' angry wife - Plymouth Live
articles.description: Footage shows St Blazey FC players leaving accommodation in Plymouth after reportedly breaking Covid guidelines
articles.content:
Video apparently shot by Les Dennis' wife allegedly shows members of a football team breaching Covid rules by throwing a party in a Plymouth Airbnb.

articles.title: Liverpool appoint new assistant to Michael Edwards in major club reshuffle - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool have promoted Julian Ward to the new role of assistant sporting director
articles.content:
Liverpool have promoted loan and pathways manager Julian Ward to the role of assistant sporting director.
